snippet.title: Cataclismo - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Get another look at gameplay in this latest Cataclismo trailer. Defend the last bastion of humanity in a ruined world, building fortresses brick by brick to fend off waves of Horrors. Withstand the siege and rise above the haze in a story of hope, resilience, and community. Cataclismo will be available on PC (via Steam and GOG) on July 16, 2024.
